SELECT oi.`id` orderId, oi.`order_no` orderNo, oi.`customer_code` customerCode, oi.`customer_name` customerName, oi.`biz_uid` bizUid, oi.`biz_uname` bizUname, oi.`contract_no` contractNo, oi.`legal_name` legalName, oi.`biz_belong_depart` bizBelongDepart, oi.`reference_no` referenceNo, oi.`biz_code` bizCode, (SELECT pb.name FROM product_biz pb WHERE pb.id_code = oi.`biz_code` LIMIT 1) bizDesc, oi.created_user createdUser, DATE_FORMAT(oi.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') createdTimeStr, oi.`selected_server` selectedServer, oi.`class_code` classCode, oi.`unit_code` unitCode, oi.`unit_account` unitAccount, oi.`is_data_all` isDataAll FROM order_info oi WHERE 1 = 1
and oi.`id` = #{idValue}

SELECT (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM order_info o1) AS allCount, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM order_info o2 WHERE o2.status = '2') AS preSubmitCount, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM order_info o3 WHERE o3.status = '4') AS dataNotAllCount FROM DUAL
